item.title: 2025 DuckDuckGo Charitable Donations: $1.1M to privacy and digital competition non-profits around the world
item.content:encoded: DuckDuckGo is donating $1,100,000 in 2025 to support organizations that share our vision of raising the standard of trust online.

item.title: The DuckDuckGo subscription now includes more advanced AI chat models, along with VPN & more
item.content:encoded: Access more advanced AI models from OpenAI, Anthropic, and others in Duck.ai as part of the DuckDuckGo subscription, formerly called Privacy Pro.

item.title: Try Privacy Pro for 7 Days with New Free Trials
item.content:encoded: Since launching our Privacy Pro subscription service, we've worked hard to make features like the DuckDuckGo VPN more powerful and easier to use.

item.title: The DuckDuckGo Browser: Fresh New Look, Same Great Protections, AI Optional
item.content:encoded: Redesigned icons, a softer interface, a fresh color palette, and interactive elements to show you exactly how DuckDuckGo is protecting you.

item.title: DuckDuckGo Browser’s Scam Blocker Expands to Include Protection from More Threats
item.content:encoded: The DuckDuckGo browser’s built-in Scam Blocker guards against phishing sites, malware, and other common online scams. It’s free, anonymous, and on by default, so you’re protected as soon as you open the browser.

item.title: Private, Useful, and Optional AI: DuckDuckGo offers free access to popular AI chatbots at Duck.ai and expands AI-assisted answers on its search engine
item.content:encoded: DuckDuckGo’s approach to AI is to provide private, useful, and optional AI features – including chat and search instant answers – to people who want the productivity benefits of AI without the privacy risks.

item.title: 2024 DuckDuckGo Charitable Donations: $1.1M to support digital rights, online privacy, and a better Internet ecosystem
item.content:encoded: DuckDuckGo is donating $1,100,000 in 2024 to support organizations that share our vision of raising the standard of trust online.

item.title: Roadblocks to Competition: Investigate Google’s Non-Compliance with the EU’s Digital Markets Act
item.content:encoded: DuckDuckGo calls on the European Commission to launch three non-compliance investigations around Google’s obligations under the EU’s Digital Markets Act (DMA).

item.title: Investing in privacy-respecting companies that are raising the standard of trust online
item.content:encoded: With the core objective of supporting consumer privacy technologies, DuckDuckGo is now actively investing in early-stage companies as well as pursuing acquisitions and partnerships.

item.title: Creating Enduring Competition in the Search Market
item.content:encoded: As a company that operates a search engine that directly competes with Google, we have several ideas about how to craft a set of legal and technical interventions that can, in combination, effectively curb the advantages Google has gained through illegal use of their search monopoly.

item.title: DuckDuckGo AI Chat: anonymous access to popular AI chatbots
item.content:encoded: DuckDuckGo AI Chat is an anonymous way to access popular AI chatbots – currently, GPT 3.5 Turbo, Claude 3 Haiku, and open-source models Llama 3 and Mixtral 7x8B, with more to come. This optional feature is free to use, within a daily limit.

item.title: Meet DuckDuckGo Privacy Pro: a 3-in-1 subscription service with VPN, Personal Information Removal, and Identity Theft Restoration
item.content:encoded: Privacy Pro bundles three new DuckDuckGo protections for one low price. Get a secure non-logging VPN; Personal Information Removal, which helps remove your information from people search sites; and Identity Theft Restoration, which helps to fix credit report mistakes and recover financial losses.

item.title: DuckDuckGo browser upgrade: Privately sync your bookmarks and passwords across devices
item.content:encoded: Sync bookmarks, passwords, and Email Protection settings between DuckDuckGo browsers on phones, tablets, and computers, privately and securely.

item.title: Great for Privacy, Great for the Environment: DuckDuckGo Is Now Carbon Negative
item.content:encoded: DuckDuckGo is now carbon negative dating back to our founding in 2008 through 2020, and is committed to being carbon negative in perpetuity.

item.title: 2023 DuckDuckGo Charitable Donations: $1.1M to support privacy, competition, and digital rights
item.content:encoded: 2023 marks DuckDuckGo's 13th year of donations— our annual program supporting organizations that are raising the standard of trust online.
